thread_text:
[For the videos where I've changed the caption to add in "criminal justice news," you should see a clickable link under each video that will take you to the original tweet]

1️⃣ Houston TX: trampling a peaceful protestor with a horse

(If you can't control it in a crowd, you shouldn't be riding it; if you *can* control it, then the trampling was deliberate)

https://t.co/9QRscHGQKR

2️⃣ New York City, NY: Shoving an unarmed woman to the curb, prompting a seizure that put her in the emergency room

(3 different videos in this same thread with different angles of the assault)

https://t.co/bKrkLdsHjY https://t.co/WSD7nP25Ej

3️⃣ New York City, NY: doing an intentional hit-and-run with a car door to an unarmed protestor standing in the non-vehicular bike lane 

https://t.co/QOlTCWqWi4

4️⃣ New York City, NY: beating a variety of unarmed protestors for sport 

https://t.co/nGARHwEhwg

https://t.co/c7Sdf0QnEy

https://t.co/Uam7whcd8n

7️⃣ Minneapolis, MN: pepper-spraying a variety of unarmed protestors for sport 

https://t.co/XFWXpXoFqd

8️⃣ Minneapolis, MN: detonating flashbang grenades in a docile crowd of unarmed protestors for sport

(Note: this was from the first day of protests; the police are firing from the roof of the 3rd Precinct, which is now ash)

https://t.co/WuqL2IkfsG

9️⃣ Minneapolis, MN: shooting a random protestor in the neck with a rubber bullet, then detonating more flash-bangs

(Note: this was from the first day of protests; the police are firing from the roof of the 3rd Precinct, which is now ash)

https://t.co/0hUiiGcpIg

🔟 Minneapolis, MN: police arresting an identified reporter, live on-air

https://t.co/FFnezi4iKw

1️⃣1️⃣ Denver, CO: police shooting reporters with paintballs, live on-air

https://t.co/HoEPojUrFV

1️⃣2️⃣ Louisville, KY: police shooting reporters with pepperballs, live on-air

https://t.co/VQpfcNTcR5

1️⃣3️⃣ Denver, CO: intentionally pepper-spraying anyone recording police brutality, outside the state's capitol grounds 

 https://t.co/2AtRGEBoHt

1️⃣4️⃣ Lincoln, NE: doing a Tiananmen Square with a police SUV through a line of unarmed protestors

https://t.co/9GWn664AOq

1️⃣5️⃣ Atlanta, GA: deploying a... kid militia?

This boy looks like he's about 11-12. Outfitted in full riot gear. 

 https://t.co/5CzzIHDV6H

(Re 1️⃣5️⃣ above, it's the "Redneck Militia" children 😂🤣)

https://t.co/afDe2kxMmh

1️⃣6️⃣ Minneapolis, MN: police shoot a widely-known reporter in the face for sport, literally blowing apart her left eye

https://t.co/TdWGw94ce0

1️⃣7️⃣ Atlanta, GA: a bike cop picks up his bike and uses it to push over an unarmed protestor for sport 

https://t.co/EOaMWwqhsN

1️⃣8️⃣ Columbus, OH: police, unprovoked, pepper-spraying a United States Congresswoman and several other elected officials for sport 

https://t.co/DV1B0IfafJ

1️⃣9️⃣ Detroit, MI: an officer charges through a group of other officers to attack a protestor who is backing away (timestamp 0:13-0:17)

https://t.co/SNysMGCMg4

2️⃣0️⃣ New York City: NYPD officer (assuming a sergeant or lieutenant since he's in a white shirt?) shoving an unarmed protestor for sport

 https://t.co/6xsu4a2aiF

Video of 1️⃣8️⃣ above in Columbus OH

Looks like the officer throws a protestor to the ground, then another comes in to pepper-spray the Congresswoman and other elected officials

https://t.co/dx6doDHxXA

2️⃣1️⃣ Harrisburg, PA: protestors try to help someone stand up; police wait until the person is halfway up before pepper-spraying the helpers in the face for sport 

 https://t.co/LYKU9oKXRr

2️⃣2️⃣ San Jose, CA: hard to figure out what's going on here – a clearly-amped officer shouts "SHUT UP, BITCH!" to a protestor, then something happens and the police bum-rush everyone 

 https://t.co/sPAmP728QA

This appears to be the same officer in 2️⃣2️⃣ above, licking his lips in anticipation of getting to shoot civilians 

Unhinged 

https://t.co/nRtEYheqeJ

2️⃣3️⃣ Columbus, OH: Unarmed protestors peacefully chanting when officers start randomly pepper-spraying them for sport 

 https://t.co/tO9C5XAYC4

Vids 21 and onward appear to be from today, so instead of "past 36 hours" we're in "past 48-60 hours" territory

Keep that in mind as you scroll / RT, because I know police sycophants like to insist "yOu'Re BeInG mIsLeAdInG"

2️⃣4️⃣ Salt Lake City, UT: SWAT unit recorded on the local news attacking a gray-haired old man with a cane, who's minding his own business, and shoving him to the ground 

https://t.co/xCQYVRzb4C

2️⃣5️⃣ New York City, NY: doing a Tiananmen Square, making sure to accelerate quickly to run over protestors before they can move

 https://t.co/K9JIACi6Vf

2️⃣6️⃣ Minneapolis, MN: police (illegally) demand homeowners go inside instead of filming, then *shoot them on their own porch* when they don't 

https://t.co/AQtSZExGGR

2️⃣7️⃣ Raleigh, NC: an hours-long peaceful protest turns violent as police indiscriminately fire teargas into the crowd 

https://t.co/9eVnaqVz8p

2️⃣8️⃣ Raleigh, NC: pepperballing peaceful and unarmed protestors 

https://t.co/PKXyyeM7pB

2️⃣9️⃣ Minneapolis, MN: forcing a reporter to the ground, then deliberately pepper-spraying him in the face at close range for sport

https://t.co/YAOMYIhxEZ

3️⃣0️⃣ Minneapolis, MN: shooting and arresting an unarmed reporter who's trying to comply with police orders

https://t.co/UDX3YUPtQv

3️⃣1️⃣ Philadelphia, PA: hitting a reporter and trying to knock down their camera to block them from filming as officers dogpile an unarmed black man 

https://t.co/Gofpy42koT

3️⃣2️⃣ Seattle, WA: police pepper-spray a 10-year-old child for sport 

 https://t.co/9nBwUUzeSr

3️⃣3️⃣ Denver, CO: police caught on camera pushing a reporter into an open fire 

 https://t.co/lKuZJBgUaE

3️⃣4️⃣ Los Angeles, CA: LAPD tackling one unarmed protestor and indiscriminately beating others with their batons

 https://t.co/0X7R9iErJ4

 https://t.co/9IbBtfjeWo

https://t.co/zdx4nXg2Kc

3️⃣7️⃣ New York City, NY: another without video, but NYPD arrested another reported and kept him in jail for 6 hours

[Arresting someone for blocking traffic that the police had already blocked was tried in Durham back during the Jose Huerta protests too]

https://t.co/2SaeRiqyJc

3️⃣8️⃣ Chicago, IL: reporter streaming live on Periscope, holds up his press pass and shouts "PRESS!" – so police pepper-spray him to stop him from broadcasting 

The 7th Circuit Court of Appeals has ruled there's a 1A right to record public police activity

https://t.co/5qlioMl9sE

3️⃣9️⃣ Los Angeles, CA: police attack John Cusack for filming 

The 9th Circuit Court of Appeals was the first – in 1995, decades ago – that there's a First Amendment-guaranteed right to record public police activity 

https://t.co/4LjQ4Ics9g

4️⃣0️⃣ Dallas, TX: police shoot a totally innocent bystander – a woman walking home with her groceries – in the head for sport https://t.co/Gdgiu11aaj

4️⃣1️⃣ Seattle, WA: police arrest a protestor using the same knee-on-neck technique used to murder #GeorgeFloyd

Another protestor yells "GET YOUR FUCKING KNEE OFF HIS NECK" – at which point the *other* officer forcibly moves the first officer's leg

 https://t.co/PmMvuz5Ab4

4️⃣2️⃣ Minneapolis, MN: police threaten to "bake" a reporter for filming them, as he claims journalists are "the problem"

https://t.co/ZCkSnNOdIi

4️⃣3️⃣ Detroit, MI: police deliberately target a journalist with pepper-spray to prevent him from reporting 

https://t.co/7pavhK9lZP

4️⃣4️⃣ Cleveland, OH: police beating assorted protestors outside their justice building, including one officer swinging his baton in front of him back and forth like a f*cking moron

 https://t.co/C3y3Cvevz8

4️⃣5️⃣ Erie, PA: police pepper-spray a peaceful protestor, then kick her over for sport 

 https://t.co/SgqEy8z2bm

4️⃣6️⃣ Minneapolis, MN: police shoot rubber bullets and teargas at a reporter and his crew, as they're broadcasting live on-air 

 https://t.co/qKEjEkEVzU

4️⃣7️⃣ Minneapolis, MN: police deliberately target a CBS crew, shooting the sound engineer with a rubber bullet 

"They're sighting us in, dude!"

Notice the reporters are *nowhere near* any protestors or police 

 https://t.co/M4552lCYjg

4️⃣8️⃣ New York City, NY: an NYPD officer *removes the mask* from a peaceful protestor, so he could then mace him in the face 

 https://t.co/o3oQ43Nspk

4️⃣9️⃣ New York City, NY: NYPD (Lt? Sgt? White shirt) pins down a medic with his knee, as another officer tries to push back anyone attempting to record 

"I'M A MEDIC! I'M A MEDIC!!!"

 https://t.co/1qmL4YItRT

5️⃣0️⃣ Columbus, OH: a peaceful woman stands still holding a sign, quite a distance from police, as another man holds his bike in front of her to shield her

Police shoot her anyway 

 https://t.co/zs79bhx9ia

5️⃣1️⃣ New York City, NY: NYPD officer (white shirt, higher rank of some sort) pushes a barricade into protestors, eventually knocks it over because he's a moron, then climbs over it so he can rush into the crowd to beat an unarmed woman

 https://t.co/u2AkYruy97

5️⃣2️⃣ Sacramento, CA: police shoot out a young black boy's eye for sport

https://t.co/DUQOUlSpu4

5️⃣3️⃣ Louisville, KY: forgot to add this one in earlier. Police loot medical supplies, destroys others, as cops push protestors back to stop them from recording

This violates the Fifth and Fourteenth Amendments to the Constitution btw

https://t.co/zhnaFZ4dCu

For folks sharing stuff on Facebook, the original compilation (videos 1️⃣ through 2️⃣1️⃣) is available here: https://t.co/QLWTH9hUOk

The 05/30-31 compilation (2️⃣2️⃣ through 5️⃣3️⃣) is available here: https://t.co/34SAUuEJXS

https://t.co/J5qjsMjxaq
